dcanMsgObjCfgParams Struct Reference
IP » DCAN

Structure holding common configuration parameters of tx /rx of DCAN module. More...

#include <dcan.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

Structure holding common configuration parameters of tx /rx of DCAN module.

Field Documentation

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::direction

Message object direction.For valid values refer enum dcanDirection_t

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::dirMask

Message Direction Mask: Valid values: TRUE or FALSE Valid only for RX

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::fifoEOBFlag

Message object is part of FIFO Buffer or not Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::intEnable

Interrupt Enable : IntPnd will be triggered or not after the successful transmission/reception of a frame Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::msgIdentifier

Message Identifier - [28:0] are valid bits [28:18]: Standard Identifier , [17:0]: Extended Identifier

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::msgIdentifierMask

Identifier Mask - [28:0] are valid bits. [28:18]: Standard Identifier Mask, [17:0]: Extended Identifier Mask Valid only for RX

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::msgValid

Valid or Invalid Message Objects.Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::remoteEnable

At the reception of a remote frame, TxRqst bit is changed Valid only for TX - Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::uMaskUsed

Use mask (Msk[28:0], MXtd, and MDir) for acceptance filtering or not Valid only for RX

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::xIdFlag

Extended IDE Flag : Standard / Extended Identifier For valid values refer enum # dcanXidType_t

uint32_t dcanMsgObjCfgParams::xIdFlagMask

Extended Identifier IDE bit Mask: Valid values: TRUE or FALSE Valid only for RX
